name: CubeCam
description:
CubeCam is a traditional platformer with two very simple twists: you must bring a cube with you to the end of the level, and this cube controls your camera. Currently features 5 levels and is in active development. This is not at all a full release.

Controls:

A & D: Move left and right

Space: Jump

Left Click: Throw the Camera

R: Reset a level
